name: Dodgebot (Themanss22)
description:
Dodgebot is an PvP multiplayer game where you play as Dodgebots and three different game modes. Play with friends or other players. Do you have what it takes. 

WARNING 

Dodgebot contains bright and flashing light which may potentially contain seizure triggers for those who have photosensitive epilepsy.

Viewer Discretion is advised
